message: Let's start with a fair split, 60-40. You can do better than this?
You can do better than this? I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.
You're being greedy, Bob! I'll give you a better deal this time.
I'm not going to be greedy, but I'm not going to give you all the money either. You can do better than this?
You're getting closer, Bob! But I'm not going to give you all the money. I'll meet you halfway.
